snippet.title: Rogue Girl - Official Game Trailer (old)
snippet.description:
Steam: Search "Rogue Girl"
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Kishi_Games

* Rogue Girl
A roguelike game that will immerse you in an exciting adventure, where you embody a beautiful devil girl called upon to fight an army of sinister zombies.

* Skills
Your path of progress depends on your decisions. As you level up, you will be offered random skills that allow you to mold your own unique play style.

* Enemies
You will have to clear the gloomy rooms from the crowds of zombies. But be prepared, because with each room the danger and the number of enemies will only grow.

* Permanent Death
Every action you take has consequences, and every death is the beginning of a new adventure.

* Other Features
- Roguelike elements: random rooms, enemies, skills, permanent death
- Various types of enemies
- Dozens of rooms
- Dozens of skills (with buffs and debuffs
- Detailed damage statistics (optional)
- Dark fantasy-style graphics
- Isometric camera
- Atmospheric music

#game #trailer #roguelike #girl #rogue
